title: 关于刷怪塔的问题
author: wjfmmyjj
txt_content: 1.8版本刷怪塔是不是仍然需要 在头顶上24格以上的地方才会刷怪？？

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
http://www.minecraftwiki.net/wiki/Spawn
There must be no players and no player spawn points within a 24 block distance (spherical) of the spawning block 

http://www.minecraftwiki.net/wiki/Monster_Spawner
The spawner will only spawn mobs if the player is within 16 blocks of it. 

單純刷怪, 要距離人物或重生點24格以上,32格外有一定機率消失, 128格外立刻消失
刷怪籠則是要人物距離16格以內才會刷怪
